import React,{useEffect,Fragment} from "react"; import {useDispatch,useSelector} from "react-redux"; import {getDetailsProducts,clearErrors} from "../../actions/productAction"; import {useAlert} from "react-alert"; import Loader from "../layouts/Loader"; import MetaData from "../layouts/MetaData"; const ProductDetails = ({match}) =>{ const dispatch = useDispatch(); const {loading,error,product} = useSelector(state=>state.productDetails) const alert= useAlert(); useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(getDetailsProducts(match.params.id)); if(error){ alert.error(error); dispatch(clearErrors()); } },[dispatch,alert,error,match.params.id]) return ( {loading ? :(

{product.name}

We also partnered with Roku to bring you the best possible content with thousands of channels to choose from, conveniently presented through your own custom home screen.

 )} ) } export default ProductDetails;
